hymn.title: What a wondrous fact, I'm crucified with Christ
hymn.category: Union with Christ—Identified with His Death and Resurrection
hymn.chords: | C - C/E - | F - C - | C - Am - | Dm - G - | F - C/E - | Dm G C - | Dm/F - C/E F | C/G G7 C - | C - F/C - | C - - - | G - - - | C - G7 - | C - G/B - | Am - C/G - | Dm - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: What a won -- drous fact, I'm cru -- ci -- fied with Christ; Of my flesh and pas -- sion I'm re -- lieved; What a glo -- rious fact, with Christ, the Lord, I live, Re -- sur -- rec -- tion life in Him re -- ceived. On the Cross of Cal -- va -- ry the Lord and I Were cru -- ci -- fied, were cru -- ci -- fied; Now in re -- sur -- rec -- tion life with Him I live And in Him e'er a -- bide.

lyrics.stanza: On the Cross of Calvary the Lord and I Were crucified, were crucified; Now in resurrection life with Him I live And in Him e'er abide.
